alert.note: Alert for Adams; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west-central Wisconsin through 1145 PM CDT... At 1100 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Babcock to 6 miles south of Tomah. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Rome around 1120 PM CDT. New Lisbon around 1125 PM CDT. Mauston around 1130 PM CDT. Necedah around 1135 PM CDT. Dellwood around 1140 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Miner MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for west central Wisconsin.
